about_the_game: In a mysterious eastern kingdom, Xiao Heizi often bullies the little chicks in the chicken coop. Finally, on a dark and stormy night, the little chicks picked up their weapons and bravely fought back against Xiao Heizi and his friends. Will they be able to defeat Xiao Heizi and win the ultimate dignity? Pick up your weapons, defeat the Xiao Heizi you see!

name: Chicken Boy's Counterattack

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX1060
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4.00GHz
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM

short_description: This is a bullet hell arcade game where you move to dodge bullets, rebound them, and eliminate Xiao Heizi to unlock more chicken boys. Keep fighting back against Xiao Heizi! Come on, show the dignity of Chicken Boy and say no to Xiao Heizi.
